snippet.title: RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Unleash the Supernatural. 🧪

Raidou Kuzunoha XIV returns in RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army, coming June 19th!

Pre-order now on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Steam, and Xbox Series X|S! https://atlus.link/Raidou-Pre-Order

PlayStation: https://atlus.link/Raidou-PS
Nintendo Switch: https://atlus.link/Raidou-NSW
Steam: https://atlus.link/Raidou-Steam 
Xbox: https://atlus.link/Raidou-Xbox

Take a closer look at the title with “The Return of Raidou Kuzunoha | World Spotlight,” a special program on our YouTube channel! ▶️ https://atlus.link/Raidou-World-Spotlight

Follow Atlus West:
Twitter/X - https://www.twitter.com/Atlus_West
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/atlus_west
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@atlus_west 
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/atluswest
Web - https://atlus.com
